revision.text:
{{doomwiki|link=Tower_of_Babel_(source_port)}}'''Tower of Babel''' is a [[source port]] being worked on by Ryan Cordell. It is a fork of [[Graf Zahl]]'s [[GZDoom]] project and plans to support several extra features besides base [[ZDoom]] and GZDoom, such as finer control on actor property change action functions.
==Links== *{{forum|t=30047|ZDoom Forums project thread}} *[http://genesis-saga-svn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ Project download page] [[Category:ZDoom-based source ports]]
